description: National Defense Department wants 10 GAGE, LIQUID QUANTITY, FLOAT TYPE from 2 vendors: NCAGE:14487 PROVISION INC. (Part No.: 16410-2) and NCAGE: 19062 ESSEX IND. (Part No.: 50C-0014-0022) to deliver to 25 CFSD Montreal by March 2025
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Request for Proposal (RFP)

#### Solicitation Number: W8485-258533/A
#### Publication Date: 2024-11-21
#### Tender Closing Date: 2025-01-07, 14:00:00 (Local Time)

The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a request for proposal (RFP) for the procurement of liquid quantity gages and float type sensors. This procurement is a competitive process aiming to select the vendor offering the best price.

### Tender Details

* **UNSP/CPCS:** 25202607, Aircraft oxygen equipment
* **Type of Bid:** Competitive, open bidding
* **Procurement Category:** Goods
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Contract Award Criteria:** Lowest Price

### Items to be Procured
1._item No._: 1
	+ **Description: Gage, Liquid Quantity, Float Type**, Part No. _(16410-2)_, NSN _(01-177-5094)_, Quantity: 10 units
	+ **Delivery Location:** 25 CFSD Montreal
2. _item No._: 2
	+ **Description: Gage, Liquid Quantity, Float Type**, Part No. _(50C-0014-0022)_, NSN _(01-225-5069)_, Quantity: 10 units
	+ **Delivery Location:** 25 CFSD Montreal

### Important Notes
- Due to COVID-19 pandemic, it is highly recommended to submit bids electronically using epost Connect service.
- Submission of equivalent or substitute products is permissible.
- The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers.
- Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Contact Information
If you have any questions, please contact:
* Dany Lebel, purchasing representative (000) 000-0000, [dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca)

### Document and Submission Guidance
All documents and related information can be downloaded from [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/) (links provided under **Attachments:**)

The solicitations documents (in an electronic format only) are available from the Canada Buys website at:
* **English:** https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52461/w8485-258533a-gage%2Cliquid
